TopicTitle: How to install mods (Astronomer's visual pack V3)

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, a while back I posted a new cinematic showcase video demonstrating what the Astronomer's visual pack looked like. I thought it would be a good idea on also how to create a guide about how to download it and make it work. Please do bear in mind I constructed the video quite hastily and I may of mucked up. If you do spot any errors, please do not be afraid to point them out. All constructive criticism is welcome!

Cinematic

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=45bM...vEIwyQIE1ULw3Q

Tutorial

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iTQO...vEIwyQIE1ULw3Q

Thank you very much for taking the time to read this

-EliteShadowLeo
